cleaned_text: IV Megadose Vitamin C (Immunity boosting) Description It is a high vitamin C intake into the bloodstream together with vitamin B And many other minerals. In addition to helping increase antioxidants and essential minerals that the body needs. vitamin C is also a stimulant for immunity. It is a method that alternative medicine is used to treat many diseases such as asthma, migraine, fatigue, muscle aches. certain infectious diseases, respiratory diseases, allergies, autoimmune diseases, Skin rash and Diseases of the heart and arteries.
